div.bibl: The Greek Press, Jan. 21, 1932, p. 4 NEW CHICAGO CHAPTER OF MARPATHIAN CLUB

body.p: Last Wednesday, G. Papadopoulos, Supreme President of the Karpathian Educational Progressive Club, whose headquarters are in Pittsburgh, installed a Chicago chapter of this organization. Andrew Karzas who is a Kapathian donated his offices and the Trianon ballroom.
After business formalities were over officers were elected. They are President, Dr. -. De Meur; Secretary, E. Karatianos; Treasurer, B. Aslaniois; and Advisors, J. Chrisos and B. Karagiannis.
The club has five chapters in the united States. Its purpose is to build schools and hospitals in Karpatha, Greece.
